title: Youâ€™re building a keyword recognition model that requires word-level information from a spoken audio file. Your job is to extract the full transcription and break it into individual words for use in training.

parts.description:
Write a Python script to process the audio file. Your program must:
1.	Use the speech_recognition library to load and process the audio file.
2.	Transcribe speech using the recognize_google () function.
Print the transcribed sentence with space seperated words
parts.expected_text: lady I was latest runtime download noisy and fearless
